title: Inputs into keyboard not being registered.
body:
Hi all,

My keyboard works fine in the client but as soon as i load into a game it completely stops working. I press any key and there is no response. I have browsed the forums for any fixes and found a few scenarios like this. I applied the fixes that was recommended but still nothing. Any advice would be appreciated!

Fix found and tried to no success
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/JKd602O7-keybindings-dont-work-until-i-relog-in-about-25-of-my-games
- many of the other fixes were variations to this

replies.body:
Is it only your keyboard? I know there was an issue with discord overlay recently that would prevent any input. Try disabling it if you have it.

If not, do you have any macro software active on your keyboard? Any other overlays that might be interacting badly with the game?

Thanks for the response! 

No, I've got nothing of the sort. No discord overlay or macro software. I repaired the game and it didn't work. Then i reinstalled the game and that was not successful too. Any other thoughts?

Mmm that's as far as my guesses go. I'd recommend submitting a ticket to support:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
